statements: DELETE FROM retail_store_sales WHERE store_id = 1 AND sale_date = '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM retail_store_sales WHERE store_id = 1 AND sale_date = '2022-01-01' AND total_sales > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM retail_store_sales WHERE total_sales < 500.00 AND sale_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM store_sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND store_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM store_inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 10 OR unit_price > 50;
DELETE FROM store_sales WHERE store_id = 1 AND sale_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM store_inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND product_quantity <= 10
DELETE FROM store_sales WHERE store_id = 2001 AND sale_amount < 100;
DELETE FROM store_inventory WHERE store_id = 3 AND quantity < 10;
